column4: no dice. i don't get it
if it still not come up check if the universe repo is enabled in /etc/apt/sources.list
and then run sudo apt-get update first
no, 11.10, but I just switched the webpage and it says it's available. I think this is a case of rackspace messing with me
looks like they have their own apt mirrors
i've done that, I haven't edited sources.list
i dont know what mirror.rackspace.com is, try to use the real repos
right.. that is what rackspace has on their default ubuntu image.  I Just realized that..
